metadata.title: CVE-2023-27784 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue found in TCPReplay v.4.4.3 allows a remote attacker to cause adenial of service via the read_hexstring function at the utils.c:309endpoint.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
